name: fantastic-ship
description:
A 2 player game of space travel in a defective spaceship.

  • Try to fix the thrusters by accessing their panels when they go out
  • Don't lose your sense of space

Commands:

  • Player 1 : wad/joystick 1
  • Player 2: arrows/joystick 2
  • Restart: r

Tools:

  • Godot
  • Libresprite
  • sfxr
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Pop!_OS
